lab3Source
Class Snake

java.lang.Object
  lab3Source.Snake
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Snake
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

This is what make the game tick. It updates the position according to the controller.

Method Detail

run

public void run()
Overloads run() in the Runnable interface. Updates the position of the snake and check whether it is outside or takes a bonus. Also randomizes bonuses randomly in time.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
